Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For 45 M: events 1 (register), 4 (triage), 15 (discharge), also X-ray (7) and doctor consultation (23) and maybe other events. So that belongs to same case. Also X-ray at 08:15:42 is for patient 45 M. So case includes events 1,4,7,13,15. For 62 F: events 2 (register), 5 (triage), 8 (lab test requested), 10 (lab test completed), 12 (doctor consultation), 14 (prescription), 17 (discharge). Also maybe other events? Yes. No triage not present for surgery case; they go directly to doctor consultation.

Name: Backtracking - NE
